Class GridElementView

java.lang.Object
edu.rpi.legup.ui.boardview.ElementView
edu.rpi.legup.ui.boardview.GridElementView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
BattleshipElementView, BinaryElementView, FillapixElementView, HeyawakeElementView, LightUpElementView, MasyuElementView, MinesweeperElementView, NurikabeElementView, ShortTruthTableElementView, SkyscrapersElementView, StarBattleElementView, SudokuElementView, ThermometerElementView, ThermometerNumberView, TreeTentElementView
public class GridElementView extends ElementView
A view class for a grid cell element in the board. This class extends ElementView and represents a specific type of element view associated with a GridCell.
